author: dmitrijus
body:
(forward port of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/9332)
Added scripts for on-the-fly log file compression (ztee.py) and reading (ztail.py).

(forward port of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/10589)
Re-organizes the python configuration files for the online DQM:
- no longer in DQM/Integration/python/test, but in DQM/Integration/python/clients/
- configuration (includes) is separated and now exists in DQM/Integration/python/config/
- playback/production are no longer configured via patches, but rather via /etc/dqm_run_config:

```
[host]
type = playback
```

This is necessary and this PR also enables the DQM File Saver. The new file saver directly wires 
metadata files (used by the DQM GUI) and maintains a backup file (in case the application crashes).
title: Re-organize python configurations for the online DQM applications
